message: I'm on AT&T and as far as I know, nothing has changed since this article http://www.bgr.com/2009/08/21/att-to-require-smartphone-data-plans-starting-september-6th/ So my assumption is that if I buy a smartphone, Samsung Focus if anyone is wondering, I won't be able to just pop in my current SIM card that isn't using a data plan.
